title: february 9: a free man
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about Nelson Mandela, the day he was set free from prison, and his ensuing presidency after a life spent fighting against apartheid. Then she talks about an awesome recent release. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
